topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555434766368725856250800#post_555434766368725856250800
How about this? I catch it in the third week of showing. Generally in large budget film release the first weekened is the most important. From then on it's just an exponential decline in sales to the second weekend. By the third you'll be lucky to make even 10% of what you made on opening weekend.

topics.body:
So E3 is coming up pretty soon.

Anything anyones excited for?

also, you know, please try to be respectful to the things people like.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5554375c6368724368150000#post_5554375c6368724368150000
Not really. If Konami has a presence I wanna see them justify all this dumb shit they've been doing. Although I do hope we get more information about Scalebound. Maybe get a final release date for Persona 5.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5554382263687260b2582200#post_5554382263687260b2582200
Well to be honest everyone is mad at Konami right now. 

For me I'm hoping for Star Fox. I mean Its pretty much going to be there I know.

But, I just hope to god its good. I've been waiting for so long for a new Star fox game. 

Scalebound I'm really hoping for as well, I mean its been a while and we have heard absolutely nothing on it, like, AT ALL.

And of course Persona 5 has my hype as well.

Also, I hope to see what the new Fallout looks like, just hopefully its there. also SHOW THE DOOM TRAILER PLEASE. 

But really, I'm just hoping for a good time! So much hype this year.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
Welp, Guess I'm going to bed too.

Night guys.
